title: NEW REDMERCY TRIFORCE FROZEN MALLET BUILD - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: i watched redmercys new video and he dicusses a new tri force build that actually works really well. with the phage in the triforce it gives movement speed and when the frozen mallet it slows them down so your able to keep uses your q ability on them with no damage taken in return.

body: This is an example from the last redmercy video posted. this is what you kinda should expect from the build. without the lag
